|imdb = http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0352901/}}'''Kenneth HadleyÂ '''is an English actor.

In ''[[Game of Thrones (TV series)|Game of Thrones]]'' he is portraying a [[Septon (The Rains of Castamere)|Septon]]. He joined the cast as a guest star in the [[Season 3|third season]] episode "[[The Rains of Castamere (episode)|The Rains of Castamere]]".
